title: Good Omens || Heaven is a Place on Earth || Crowley and Aziraphale
author: Rebecca Hansson
comment:
The proper way to experience Good Omens is:
1. Read the book.
2. Watch the series.
3. Thank the authors for a lovely story.

OKAY BUT 
"Baby I was afraid before" - Crowley driving away from the bookshop, thinking he'd lost Aziraphale and losing all hope
"But I'm not afraid anymore" - Crowley driving to the airbase to rejoin Aziraphale and stop the apocalypse

This is cheesiest, sappiest thing that I've ever seen and I'M SO INTO IT! The funny part is I recently added this song to my spotify because I loved it in middle school and I was reminded of my love for 80's music. This is the most adorable thing I've ever seen.
i was seriously wondering when someone realise how canon this song is  to them
I think I broke my face
description:
This song was screaming Good Omens at me and was begging to be made into the cheesiest 80s music video you've ever seen this side of the millennia. Dedicated to my husband, who had a hand in making this video even cheesier than the first prototype I showed him.

Feel absolutely welcome to share this video, but please don't reupload!

Buy me a coffee:
